author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

This was needed to test generating GEN+SIM in mixing module to generate pileup on the fly. The problem is Geant4 requires that it be initialized on one and only one thread which means all instances of OscarMTProducer must share that thread.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles. Test of on-the-fly pileup succeeded.
title: Can now run multiple OscarMTProducers in the same job
